titles.title: For the relief of Michael Patrick McNamara and Thomas Parnell McNamara, Jr.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1351)
Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 5/25/1993--Introduced. Entitles two named Federal employees to: (1) competitive status; (2) have their appointments converted to unconditional career appointments; and (3) have their positions converted to Deputy U.S. Marshall. Provides for their retirement from Federal service.
